did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Isle of Wight County Museum collection of officials' records, 1848-1884

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Isle of Wight County Museum collection of officials' records, 1848-1884. Accession 50200. Organization records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Loaned for microfilming by the Isle of Wight County Museum, Smithfield, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Isle of Wight County Museum collection of officials' records, 1848-1884, consisting of a ledger, 1848-1849, containing ticket sales, sheriff's fees, parish claims, and merchant licenses; judgment and execution book, 1850-1884, kept by John R. Purdie of Isle of Wight County, containing executions and judgments, as well as a diary, a weather diary, and accounts kept by Purdie as treasurer of Christ Church in Smithfield, Virginia; and Isle of Wight County treasurer's ledger and daybook, 1871-1881, containing accounts of the county.

did.unittitle: Ledger--tickets, sheriff's fees, parish claims, and merchant's licenses, 1848-1849.
Judgment and execution book (includes diary, weather diary, and Christ Church accounts), 1850-1884.
Isle of Wight County treasurer's ledger, 1871-1880.
Isle of Wight County treasurer's daybook, 1871-1881.
